text:
# Building with D3.js

D3.js is an amazing library for creating interactive data visualizations. In this post, I explore how to build force-directed graphs.

```javascript
const simulation = d3.forceSimulation(nodes)
    .force("link", d3.forceLink(links))
    .force("charge", d3.forceManyBody())
    .force("center", d3.forceCenter());
```

The key is understanding how forces interact to create the layout.
